PAD_KarlachWon.synopsis: Wyll became hostile and party killed him.
PAD_KarlachWon.how_to_trigger: Trigger Wyll and Karlach's camp confrontation, side with Karlach and kill Wyll (PAD not implemented currently).

PAD_WyllWon.synopsis: Karlachl became hostile and party killed her.
PAD_WyllWon.how_to_trigger: Trigger Wyll and Karlach's camp confrontation, side with Wyll and kill Karlach (PAD not implemented currently).

PAD_KarlachWon_0.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachWon_0.text: Godsdamned one-eyed fool. If only he'd listened.

PAD_WyllWon_0.speaker: Wyll
PAD_WyllWon_0.text: Karlach's fallen at last. Tonight, the people of the Coast can breath easier.
